OOC: I've had mutant malformed monsters in the RPG, actually. So have other=
 members. Basically, we can have any creature we want as long as it's not a=
nnoying to the council, I suppose...

ovember 22, 2001 3:35 PM

=
  Just cal me Dewy the nickname kind of grew on me (at first I wanted 
  to=
 be called firestorm). When I said "fairly weak" I meant as a 
  standard. =
There must have been a few who are the more intellectual 
  types like Vera=
tis on the Maximals, but Veratis is still tough. I 
  meant the kind of guy=
 I can fight without embarrasing myself

ome from mutant lizards, but 
  Cloud said he wanted a chimera, and it was =
approved by Hugar.

ote:
  > OOC: Fairly weak? I doubt anyone is going to do a fairly weak bot =

  like you think. But you know what? YOU listen! It took me a year to 
  g=
ain respect in this RPG! It took several months before people would 
  ackn=
owledge my characters existed, and I have been treated bad for a 
  long ti=
me, almost a year after my joining, because I didn't know 
  anything about=
 the RPG, wrote posts only thinking about myself, and 
  posts that happene=
d way too fast, and then wondered why people didn't 
  reply. I didn't get =
the point, that they couldn't reply to my posts, 
  because they were so co=
nfused. However, I never complained about it. 
  I spoke up when I thought =
something was weird, and I defended myself, 
  but I never complained or to=
ok shots at anyone for no reason. I had 
  to be provoked before saying any=
thing to anyone. In fact, when I 
  didn't understand the rules, I broke on=
e by mistake, and what did I 
  get? Sorry that was a mode? No! I got "List=
en you idiot." From 
  Zardus! Hell, I gave JP a chance, and he rubbed my f=
ace in the dirt. 
  You're going to have to get used to treating others how=
 you want to 
  be treated, Dewboy. It's a hard experience adapting to a ne=
w RPG, but 
  I think your going about things all wrong if you want to be 
=
  successful. I admire your determination, but you are still greedy, 
  stu=
bborn, and selfish. Oh, and Dewboy, one of the reasons I was hated 
  so mu=
ch, is because I typed in Caps...
